alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 4:57AM MST until March 05 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Most of Coconino County, Yavapai County Mountains, Navajo County, central and southern Apache County. This includes Flagstaff, Williams, Munds Park, Prescott, Grand Canyon, Seligman, Ash Fork, Keams Canyon, Kaibito, Tuba City, Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, Saint Johns, Springerville, Show Low, Pinetop, Dilkon, Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Snow will also fall at times above 5000 to 6000 feet.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
